shortdesc.ph: Reports the volume change of the audio device or app.

p.codeblock: DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_ThreeParams(FOnAudioDeviceVolumeChanged, FENUMWRAP_MEDIA_DEVICE_TYPE, deviceType, int, volume, bool, muted);
public virtual void OnAudioDeviceVolumeChanged(MEDIA_DEVICE_TYPE deviceType, int volume, bool muted)
final void Function(MediaDeviceType deviceType, int volume, bool muted)? onAudioDeviceVolumeChanged;

section.p: Occurs when the volume on the playback device, audio capture device, or the volume of the app changes.
section.note: This callback is for Windows and macOS only.

plentry.pd: The volume value. The range is [0, 255].

pd.p:
Whether the audio device is muted:
: The audio device is muted.
: The audio device is not muted.
